This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS When detached, isConnected should be false. When inserted into a document tree, isConnected should be true. 
PASS When inserted into a connected shadow tree, isConnected should be true. 
PASS When inserted into a detached tree, isConnected should be false. 
PASS When detached, isConnected should be false. When a shadow tree inserted into a document tree, isConnected should be true 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
